title: "Bayesian Rating Curve"

---
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
Sys.setlocale("LC_ALL","is_IS")
```

```{r echo=FALSE, include=FALSE}
library(stargazer,quietly=TRUE)
```  
   
```{r results='asis',echo=FALSE}
plotlist=model2()
tafla=plotlist$tafla
tafla[,"Q fit"]=format(round(exp(tafla[,"Q fit"]),3),nsmall=3)
tafla$Lower=format(round(exp(tafla$Lower),3),nsmall=3)
tafla$Upper=format(round(exp(tafla$Upper),3),nsmall=3)

stargazer(tafla,type="latex",summary=FALSE, title=paste('Rating Curve from Model 2 for ',input$name),header=FALSE,digits=3,digits.extra=3)
```
